name: Super Last Supper
description:
Story

You are a chef, the Earth food Lover monsters have taken you captive.

In order to go back to earth you should fulfil their apetite by bringing them food from earth.

Once you are teleported to earth the level starts and the portal breaks.

Gameplay

You have to find the food and fix the portal.

You have the power to sense hidden objects around earth by moving your cursor.

 This allows you to see :

The cables which takes you to the button that fixes the portal.

The hidden food that the aliens want.

Programmer:

https://piskafir.itch.io/

Designer/Artists

https://merin.itch.io/

https://sarohibo.itch.io/

PS: has controller support
